about_the_game:
Experience the complete saga of Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey with this captivating Full-Story-Unlock DLC! Dive deep into the untold story of Fenrir, the colossal wolf whose anger threatens to destroy Midgard. Unravel the mystery behind his rage and save Midgard from annihilation.

Unlock never-before-seen areas and engage with a captivating cast of characters as you explore the rich Norse mythology of Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey.

This DLC features final levels and culminates in the gripping denouement of Fenrir's Fury.
detailed_description:
Experience the complete saga of Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey with this captivating Full-Story-Unlock DLC! Dive deep into the untold story of Fenrir, the colossal wolf whose anger threatens to destroy Midgard. Unravel the mystery behind his rage and save Midgard from annihilation.

Unlock never-before-seen areas and engage with a captivating cast of characters as you explore the rich Norse mythology of Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey.

This DLC features final levels and culminates in the gripping denouement of Fenrir's Fury.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or any Intel CPU
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 13 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or any Intel CPU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Discover the full saga of Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey with this enthralling Full-Story-Unlock DLC! Uncover Fenrir's untold story, unveil the secrets behind his fury, and rescue Midgard from doom.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
